title: First Denmark, Now Belgium? Nations Strip Back Junior and U23 Programs for Rwanda Road Worlds due to Costs, Logistics
content:
Flights, altitude acclimation, inflated hotel prices put pressure on UCI's groundbreaking first African road worlds.

Read the full article at First Denmark, Now Belgium? Nations Strip Back Junior and U23 Programs for Rwanda Road Worlds due to Costs, Logistics on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
